title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 12, RULES GOVERNING PROCEDURE UNDER ARTICLE 730 OF THE CRIMINAL PROCEDURE LAW ADOPTED BY THE JUDICIAL CONFERENCE[FN*], art. 1, pt. 100 - Procedure Under Article 730 Of The Criminal Procedure Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 12, RULES GOVERNING PROCEDURE UNDER ARTICLE 730 OF THE CRIMINAL PROCEDURE LAW ADOPTED BY THE JUDICIAL CONFERENCE[FN*], art. 1, pt. 100 - Procedure Under Article 730 Of The Criminal Procedure Law

State Regulations
§ 100.1 - Definitions, version 2
§ 100.2 - Examination of defendant, version 2
§ 100.3 - Examination report, version 2
§ 100.4 - Commitment to the custody of the commissioner of mental hygiene, version 2
§ 100.5 - Order of retention for defendant held under orders of commitment, version 2
§ 100.6 - Order of adjudication of dangerousness, version 2
§ 100.7 - Certificate of custody, version 2
§ 100.8 - Official forms, version 2

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 12, RULES GOVERNING PROCEDURE
UNDER ARTICLE 730 OF THE CRIMINAL PROCEDURE LAW ADOPTED BY THE JUDICIAL
CONFERENCE[FN*], art. 1, pt. 100

Part (
§§ 100.1 --100.8) added, filed August 1, 1972. Statutory authority Criminal Procedure Law, §
730

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
